name: UtilityInsecurityServiceRequests
title: Utility Insecurity Service Requests
purpose: (Clinical Focus: <insert metadata> The value sets in this group represent the interventions associated with Utility Insecurity as identified by the Gravity Project.),(Data Element Scope: Supports the Gravity SDOH Clinical Care FHIR Implementation Guide for the exchange of servicerequest.code.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes SNOMED CT and CPT interventions that have been identified through the Gravity Project community consensus voting process.),(Exclusion Criteria: N/A)
